example.text: You can't make this up... The same day [[user]] is pushing a bill to cut unemployment fraud prevention, a member of their own party is indicted on charges including unemployment insurance fraud. [[url]]
Grateful to my fellow Co-Chairs of the Congressional Caucus on Foster Youth, [[user]] and [[user]], for their partnership in introducing the Foster Youth Mentoring Act.

I know how much our seniors and their families rely on this program, which is why I am committed to protecting Social Security. Today I'm pleased to share with you that in January, Social Security beneficiaries may see an 8.7% benefit increase, the largest single-year benefit increase since 1981.

This bill would have prevented the recall of that dangerous appliance and would prevent the Consumer Product Safety Commission from addressing other dangerous appliances in the future. Pennsylvanian families and businesses are demanding fixes for our broken immigration system. Democrats are ready to work with Republicans on common sense, long-term solutions, but we will never agree to cruel and unworkable policies like their latest immigration scheme. [[url]]

The US has the highest maternal mortality rate of any high-income country, yet over 80% of pregnancy-related deaths in the US are preventable. Congress must pass [[user]], [[user]], and [[user]]’s #Momnibus to address the drivers of this crisis and save moms’ lives. [[url]]
